form.label: Devops View: Failed Requests, Service Time and Traffic Security

p.i: Changing this will update all the panels

html.h1: Splunk's Graphing and Charting Features Enable Better Insight Into Topics Such as Traffic Requests and Upstream Service Time

panel.title: Requests With Failed HTTP Codes Over Time
Failed HTTP Codes Counted by Service Type

search.query: host=decipher-demo-canned payload.response.headers.:status!=200 | rename payload.response.headers.:status as status | timechart span=1d count by extracted_eventType

table.title: Successful Requests Compared to Failed Requests

search.query: host=decipher-demo-canned payload.response.headers.:status=200 | rename payload.response.headers.:status as status | stats count by status | eval failed_requests= [ search host=decipher-demo-canned payload.response.headers.:status!=200 | stats count as all | return $all] | eval total=count+failed_requests | eval "Failed %"= round(failed_requests/total, 5)*100 | eval "Successful %"= round(count/total, 4)*100 | rename count as "Successful Requests" | rename failed_requests as "Failed Requests" | table "Successful Requests", "Failed Requests", "Successful %", "Failed %"
host=decipher-demo-canned | rename payload.response.headers.x-envoy-upstream-service-time as "Service Time" | timechart avg("Service Time") as "Average Service Time"

table.title: Average Service Time for Each User (in ms)

search.query: host=decipher-demo-canned | rename payload.request.headers.user_dn as user | rename payload.response.headers.x-envoy-upstream-service-time as "Service Time" | stats avg("Service Time") as "Average Service Time" by user | eval "Average Service Time"=round('Average Service Time', 3) | sort - "Average Service Time"

table.title: Breakdown of Secured vs. Unsecured Traffic

search.query: host=decipher-demo-canned | stats count as total | eval unsecured= [ search host=decipher-demo-canned payload.request.headers.x-forwarded-proto="http" originatorToken="null" | rename payload.request.headers.x-forwarded-proto as traffic_type | stats count as all | return $all] | eval secured=total-unsecured | eval "secured %"=round((secured/total), 4)*100 | eval "unsecured %"=round((unsecured/total), 4)*100 | table secured, unsecured, "secured %", "unsecured %"

p.i: Unsecured traffic was assessed under the assumptions that two conditions were true: x-forwarded-proto is 'http', and the originatorToken is 'null'

table.title: Breakdown of Data Accessed (GET) vs. Data Created (POST)

search.query: host=decipher-demo-canned | rename payload.request.headers.:method as Method | stats count by Method | eventstats sum(count) as total | eval percentage=round((count/total), 4)*100 | table Method, count, percentage
